subject: AW: [junit] swingui.TestRunner doesn't show first test result
msgSnippet: I notice similar behaviour: all tests of the first suite are marked this way, even if I run them one by one by explecitely selecting them. I am using JUnit 3.5
messageBody:
I notice similar behaviour: all tests of the first suite are marked this
way, even if I run them one by one by explecitely selecting them. I am using
JUnit 3.5 in VAJ 3.5 with the -noloading option.

ciao, Ilja

-----Ursprungliche Nachricht-----
Von: Mark Antenbring [mailto:mantenbring@pureedge.com]
Gesendet: Freitag, 6. April 2001 22:18
An: junit@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: [junit] swingui.TestRunner doesn't show first test result


Hi,
I just joined the group, and couldn't search the existing posts, so forgive
me if this problem is already answered.

When the gui TestRunner runs, many times the first test has a dog-eared page
icon beside the test indicating that the test has not run, but I know it
has. There are green check-marks or X's beside the other tests showing that
they ran. This seems to be an intermittent problem, and there's no pattern
except that it's always the first test. Any thoughts?
Mark
